extendedInfo.description: This is the complete musical & free app. In this app you can listen ultimate collections of Islamic Songs By different singers like Yusuf Islam,& Zain Bhikha..etc FEATURE OF APP1. Listen an ultimate collections of audio stream of Islamic songs.2. You can download audio stream and play locally from sdcard.(Either you can play offline and online)3. You can set particular audio stream or downloaded audio as alarm to play particular time (ALARM)4. You can set any media stream and downloaded audio as favorite to make your own play list.5. You can set any media stream auto play at particular time interval like alarm. like every morning , every evening,every half day...etc7. You can exit with hard menu - options menu8. You can view our best apps and can suggest us9. You can share this app to any one now by share10. Completely FreeNote: Best on Wifi, 3G and for 2G user can download audio stream locally and play with high quality(continuous stream). For any issue please provide your valuable suggestion. Please rate us with 5 star for motivation to create free apps.
